description:
Dandy and Meow go in search of a so-called phantom ramen dish created by an other-dimensional being.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alla ricerca del ramen spaziale delle illusioni, baby.
Maboroshi no Uchuu Ramen o Sagasu Jan yo
The Search for the Phantom Space Ramen, Baby
À la recherche du ramen fantôme de l`espace, baby
幻の宇宙ラーメンを探すじゃんよ
